p: Of the 56 invited IS experts, 34 experts from 12 countries, participated in the study, corresponding to a response rate of 60.7% ( Supplementary Figure 1). Their fields of professional activity included public health ( n = 9; 26.5%), social science ( n = 6; 17.6%), mental health ( n = 4; 11.8%), acute care ( n = 2; 5.9%), psychology ( n = 2; 5.9%), primary care ( n = 1; 2.9%), social work ( n = 1; 2.9%), or other ( n = 9; 26.5%). They had a median of 12 years' experience in implementation research (IQR = 12.8; range 4â€“30).
